price: Oysa, O Allah benim Rabbimdir ve ben, Rabbime hiç kimseyi şirk koşmam.
arabic: لَّٰكِنَّا۠ هُوَ ٱللَّهُ رَبِّي وَلَآ أُشۡرِكُ بِرَبِّيٓ أَحَدٗا

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: lākinnā huwa al-lahu rabbī walā ush'riku birabbī aḥadan
